name: Ao Oni: Aftermath
description:
Game created with RPG Maker MVThe Aftermath

This story takes place after Ao Oni 5.2's ending.

After Hiroshi, Takeshi, Takuro and Mika escaped from the Mansion far from town, they thought they were free from the monstrosity inside. 

Unfortunately, everything that once resided there found its way into the school...

The game is still in an early version, so it's empty and short, along with an ending that needs to be expanded and better puzzles to add.

Comment suggestions and bug reports!
